author: Aldiandya Irsyad
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Schedule cog! This cog requires the `dateparser` library, which you should have already installed.
name: Schedule
short: Schedules a game within a forum post.
description: A command to create a simple LFG schedule message in a Discord forum post, automatically using the post's title as the game name.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
